snippet: Despite the loss, the aluminum manufacturer’s second-quarter results were slightly ahead of analysts’ expectations.
abstract: Alcoa reports second-quarter loss of $2 million, or break-even earnings per share, compared with profit of $322 million, or 28 cents per share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $5.96 billion compared with $6.59 billion.
lead_paragraph: Despite the loss, the aluminum manufacturer’s second-quarter results were slightly ahead of analysts’ expectations.

headline.seo: Alcoa Reports a $2 Million Loss in 2nd Quarter
headline.main: Alcoa’s Revenue Falls 9% on Weak Aluminum Prices
headline.print_headline: Alcoa’s Revenue Falls 9% On Weak Aluminum Prices
